    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddCustomerHandler
    Handles the HTTP GET requests to display a form for adding a new customer.
    AddProductHandler
    The AddProductHandler class handles HTTP requests for the "Add Product" functionality.
    Address
    Represents an address with multiple address lines, country, and postal code.
    AdminDashboardHandler
    Admin dashboard class which loads when a admin user logs in, allowing administrators to manage users, products, and customers.
    ApplianceItem
    A ApplianceItem constructor class.
    ApplianceItemDAO
    ApplianceItemDAO is a Data Access Object (DAO) class that provides methods for managing ApplianceItem records in an SQLite database.
    Basket
    The Basket class is for managing ApplianceItem objects and their quantities.
    BasketHandler
    The BasketHandler class handles HTTP requests related to the shopping basket.
    Controller
    The Controller class is the main application menu system that provides a menu-driven interface for managing home appliances, customers, users, and appliance items.
    Customer
    A customer class with a unique ID, business name, address, telephone number, and email address attributes.
    CustomerDAO
    The CustomerDAO class provides methods for managing customer records in an SQLite database.
    CustomerDashboardHandler
    Handles requests for the Customer Dashboard.
    DeleteCustomerHandler
    This class generates the the HTML code and logic to delete a customer from the database.
    DeleteHandler
    The DeleteHandler class handles deleting products.
    DeleteUserHandler
    Handles the HTTP request to delete a user from the system.
    HomeAppliance
    A home appliance constructor class with ID, SKU, description, category, and price attributes.
    HomeApplianceDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing HomeAppliance records in an SQLite database.
    LoginHandler
    The LoginHandler class is responsible for displaying the login page.
    LoginSessionManager
    Manages user sessions for the application.
    LoginSessionManager.UserSession
    Represents a user session, storing user-specific data.
    LogoutHandler
    Handles user logout by ending their session and redirecting them to the home page.
    Main
    It sets up the server, connects it to a specified port, and registers handlers for various endpoints.
    Order
    The Order class represents an order placed by a user.
    OrderConfirmationHandler
    Handles the display of the order confirmation page.
    OrderDAO
    OrderDAO is a Data Access Object (DAO) class that provides methods for managing Order records in an SQLite database.
    ProcessAddCustomerHandler
    Handles HTTP requests to delete a customer record.
    ProcessAddProductHandler
    The ProcessAddProductHandler class processes HTTP POST requests to add a new product.
    ProcessLoginHandler
    Handles the login form submission process.
    ProcessSignupHandler
    Handles the signup process for new customers.
    ProcessUpdateCustomerHandler
    Handles HTTP requests to process updates to an existing customer record.
    ProcessUpdateProductHandler
    The ProcessUpdateProductHandler class handles HTTP POST requests to update an existing product.
    ProcessUpdateUserRoleHandler
    Handles the process of updating a user's role.
    RootHandler
    The RootHandler class implements the HttpHandler interface and is responsible for handling requests to the root endpoint of the application.
    SignupHandler
    Handles the HTTP GET requests for the Signup page.
    UpdateCustomerHandler
    Handles HTTP requests to display the update customer form.
    UpdateProductHandler
    The UpdateProductHandler class handles HTTP GET requests to display a form for updating an existing product.
    UpdateUserRoleHandler
    Handles the HTTP request to display a form for updating a user's role.
    Users
    The Users constructor class creates a user attributes in the system.
    UsersDAO
    The UsersDAO class provides data access object methods for managing user records in the SQLite database.
    ViewAllCustomersHandler
    Handles HTTP requests to display a list of all customers.
    ViewAllProductsHandler
    The ViewAllProductsHandler class implements the HttpHandler interface and is responsible for handling HTTP requests to view and manage products, as well as handling "Add To Basket" form submissions (POST).
    ViewAllUsersHandler
    Handles HTTP requests to display a list of all users in the system.
    ViewOrdersHandler
    The ViewOrdersHandler class handles HTTP requests to display the logged-in user's order history.
